channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Gunman kills 4, including police officer, in shooting at New York City office tower
item.description: Officials say a man carrying a rifle killed four people at a New York City office tower. The shooting took place Monday afternoon at a midtown Manhattan office building that houses finance companies and the NFL headquarters.

item.title: A shooting at a midtown Manhattan office building, in photos
Krill catch in Antarctica soars to record following collapse of conservation deal
